# UITextInputTokenizer

**Protocol**

A tokenizer, which is an object that allows the text input system to evaluate text units of different granularities.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor protocol UITextInputTokenizer : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

Granularities of text units are always evaluated with reference to a storage or reference direction.

Text-processing objects that conform to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInput] protocol must hold a reference to a tokenizer (through the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInput/tokenizer] property). The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInputStringTokenizer] class provides a default base implementation of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInputTokenizer] protocol. Tokenizers of this class are suitable for most western-language keyboards. Apps with different requirements may adopt the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInputTokenizer] protocol and create their own tokenizers.

## Determining text positions relative to unit boundaries

- **isPosition(_:atBoundary:inDirection:)**: Return whether a text position is at a boundary of a text unit of a specified granularity in a specified direction.
- **isPosition(_:withinTextUnit:inDirection:)**: Return whether a text position is within a text unit of a specified granularity in a specified direction.

## Computing text position by unit boundaries

- **position(from:toBoundary:inDirection:)**: Return the next text position at a boundary of a text unit of the given granularity in a given direction.

## Getting ranges of specific text units

- **rangeEnclosingPosition(_:with:inDirection:)**: Return the range for the text enclosing a text position in a text unit of a given granularity in a given direction.

## Constants

- **UITextDirection**: The direction of the text.
- **UITextGranularity**: The granularity of a unit of text.

## Text tokenizer

- **UITextInputStringTokenizer**: A base implementation of the text-input tokenizer protocol.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

## Conforming Types

- UITextInputStringTokenizer
